content: There was a question during our meeting last Tuesday re: what work ISO is doing regarding Genomic standards. This link will give you a good idea of the different projects/standards, that are in-flight. It is important to look at the stage - with 10.x being a proposal and 30.x moving to a committee. https://www.iso.org/committee/7546903/x/catalogue/p/0/u/1/w/1/d/1
Thanks @Arthur Hermann . I would be interested in reviewing some of these, comparing against FHIR Genomics representations. Any idea who in HL7 might be able to help in that regard?

@Bob Dolin one of our co-chairs mentioned that HL7 was a representative to ISO and has access to this info. I will try to see if I can find out anything further about that. If not, let's bring this back to our working group to see if someone can assist with follow-up and understanding of how HL7 works with ISO.
